request.body:
{"message":"An error has occurred.

At `2016-05-26T20:25:37Z`, @ciuser initiated the following pipeline, assigned the unique ID `c7509247498f4be8a8307f081f7c28a5`:

    `operable:st-echo "this is a test" | operable:st-thorn $body`

The pipeline failed executing the command:

    `operable:st-thorn $body`
The specific error was:

    Sorry, you aren't allowed to execute 'operable:st-thorn $body' :(
 You will need the 'operable:st-thorn' permission to run this command.

"}
